text: ==Broadcast history== It ran from 1992 to 1995. They featured Disney cartoons and animated short films from before the advent of The Disney Channel. A similar show was Donald's Quack Attack. The show premiered on November 2, 1992,The Disney Channel Magazine, Vol. 10, no. 5, October/November 1992: pp. 34, 48. along with Donald's Quack Attack,The Disney Channel Magazine, Vol. 10, no. 5, October/November 1992: pp. 34, 49. on The Disney Channel. ===United States=== *Disney Channel (November 2, 1992 – 2000) *Toon Disney (1998–1999) ===Canada=== *Family (1994–1997) ===United Kingdom=== *Disney Channel (1995–2000) *Toon Disney (2000–2003) ===France=== *Disney Channel (1997–2002) *Toon Disney (2001–2003) ===Italy=== *Rai Due (1993–present) *Disney Channel (1998–2000) *Toon Disney (2004–2011) ===Russia=== * Channel One (2006) * Disney Channel (2013) ==References== ==Other websites== * Mickey's Mouse Tracks episode guide at The Encyclopedia of Disney Animated Shorts Category:Disney Channel television series Category:1990s American animated television series
title: Mickey's Mouse Tracks
